pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'sf'-Based Interface to the 'HERE' REST APIs // Interface to the 'HERE' REST APIs https://developer.here.com/develop/rest-apis: (1) geocode and autocomplete addresses or reverse geocode POIs using the 'Geocoder' API; (2) route directions, travel distance or time matrices and isolines using the 'Routing' API; (3) request real-time traffic flow and incident information from the 'Traffic' API; (4) find request public transport connections and nearby stations from the 'Public Transit' API; (5) get weather forecasts, reports on current weather conditions, astronomical information and alerts at a specific location from the 'Destination Weather' API. Locations, routes and isolines are returned as 'sf' objects.
